definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: And when the head of a household is baptized, the rest of the household is to be baptized.
sentences.chinese: 當一家之長受洗，屬乎他的人也當一同受洗。

sentences.english: And when the head of a household is baptized, the rest of the household is to be baptized.
sentences.chinese: 當一家之長受洗，屬乎他的人也當一同受洗。

sentences.english: To refuse baptism and to retract after baptism were crimes punishable by death.
sentences.chinese: 凡拒絕受洗和受洗後反悔的都以死刑論罪。

sentences.english: To refuse baptism and to retract after baptism were crimes punishable by death.
sentences.chinese: 凡拒絕受洗和受洗後反悔的都以死刑論罪。

sentences.english: Baptism is the application of water connected with God's to a person.
sentences.chinese: 受洗是把與神連接的水灑到人身上。

sentences.english: The jailor believed, and he and his family were baptized that very night.
sentences.chinese: 獄卒相信了，他和他的全家也都在那夜受洗。

sentences.english: Yesterday she even adviced me to take the baptism before our wedding.
sentences.chinese: 昨天她還建議我舉行婚禮前最後受洗。

sentences.english: For all I know, he’s never photographed a wedding or bar mitzvah in his life.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，他從來沒有爲婚禮和受洗拍過照片。

sentences.english: LongHollow Baptist Church's website has an interesting design.
sentences.chinese: 朗費羅受洗教堂網頁的設計非常有趣。

sentences.english: An imp of evil, emblem and product of sin, she had no right among christened infants.
sentences.chinese: 是罪孽的標誌和產物，無擠身於受洗的嬰孩之列。

sentences.english: Jesus himself, though sinless , was baptized.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌自己雖然無罪，但仍受洗。

sentences.english: Many people follow the fine Christian custom of having godparents for their baptized children.
sentences.chinese: 很多人遵守基督徒的良好傳統，爲受洗的孩子找教父。

sentences.english: Paul's Christians have also been baptized into death.
sentences.chinese: 保羅的基督徒也是把受洗等同死。

sentences.english: Then came also certain taxgatherers to be baptised and said unto him, Master, what shall we do?
sentences.chinese: 一些稅吏也來受洗，對他說，先生，我們該怎麼做呢？

sentences.english: After their arrest, and before they were led away to prison, the five catechumens were baptized.
sentences.chinese: 被捕後，始被帶離監獄，這五個新慕道者受洗。

sentences.english: Pray for those who will be baptized and those are in the catechism class.
sentences.chinese: 請爲將要受洗及慕道真理班的弟兄姊妹禱告。

definition: Holy sacrament/Christian rite (esp. Protestant)/also called 聖事|圣事 by Catholics
